lp_label: What is the type of the property?
notes: Radio: Residential / Commercial. Drives persona and some routing.

lp_label: What are the surfaces to be addressed?
notes: Stores all selected surfaces as ';'-separated values e.g. 'Deck;Fence;Hardscape'.
Optional boolean field if Ankush wants per-surface checkboxes in SFDC; otherwise infer from Surface_Tags__c.

lp_label: When are you planning to start?
notes: ASAP / Within 1 month / Within 3 months / Just exploring options.
Captured via hidden field for Google Ads offline conversion imports.
Ad/creative variant; important for RSA testing.
If Attributer.io or GA4 sends a session identifier.
Optional: direct pass-through of campaign name.
Optional: direct pass-through of ad group name.
From Google Ads or GA4; useful for reporting.
POPULATED BY FLOW: uses Siding/Deck/Structures/Furniture/Pressure rule engine, not form directly.
e.g. 'Paid Search'. High-level SFDC standard field.
e.g. 'Google Ads – Deck – Bay Area – Residential'.
POPULATED BY ZIP MATCH in flow: Bay Area vs Fringe vs Other.
TRUE when ZIP is in Fringe list. Helps for routing/minimums.
Manual notes from phone calls / follow-ups.
